import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Data
movements = ['Renaissance', 'Neoclassicism']
oldest_years = [1438, 1764]

# Plot
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
plt.bar(movements, oldest_years, color=['blue', 'green'])
plt.xlabel('Art Movement')
plt.ylabel('Oldest Year of Painting')
plt.title('Oldest Year of Painting per Art Movement')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.tight_layout()
